description:
Some guys are so hung you just have to wonder how they even function.
I mean, you got a big dick, that hangs a good 5 or 6 inches soft, and a big pair of balls that hangs even lower.
Wouldn't you be sitting on your stuff all the time? And doesn't it flop around when you run?
We've have more than our fair share of the monster cocks lately, and they all seem to coming from "down south."
Take Nathan. He's 20, hung extra large, straight, and has a girlfriend.
"I like big asses," he said, while confessing that it had been about a week since he'd gotten off...
title: Nathan
